name: Goobers Go Home
description:
==Controls==
A and D to move
Spacebar to jump

Can you help the Goobers escape this strange world and get back to their mothership? Collect mushrooms to increase your jumps and health.

There are only 4 levels, but I haven't worked on this in a while so I figured I'd release it as is. I may add more levels in the future.
